description: Try our easy to follow Rum-Soaked Mixed Fruit Pikelets recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rum-Soaked Mixed Fruit Pikelets Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup plain Greek-style yoghurt (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Place dried fruit in a bowl. Add rum, then stand for 2 hours to soak.
Sift flour and baking powder into a large bowl. Stir in sugar, then add egg, yoghurt, milk, fruit mixture and vanilla, gently stirring to combine.

Heat a large frying pan over high heat, then brush with butter. Drop 2 tbs batter into pan and spread to form a 6.5cm round. Repeat to make 2 more pikelets. Cook for 2 minutes or until bubbles start to form on surface. Turn over and cook for a further 2 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a wire rack. Repeat with remaining butter and batter to make a total of 30.
Serve pikelets dolloped with extra yoghurt and drizzled with honey.
